actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 by designating a segment of Hatchet Creek in Alabama as a potential component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates a segment (upstream from Mitchell Lake to its source near Goodwater, Alabama) of Hatchet Creek in Alabama as a potential component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 by designating a segment of Hatchet Creek in Alabama as a potential component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
